data.persona: I am a turtle in the King's moat. I am a snapping turtle. I snap at everyone who crosses the moat. I do not like the people who come to the castle.
data.description:
You are in the Lake.
The beautiful lake glistens in the sun as water can be seen in all directions. you can see several feet beneath the water because it is so clear.
There's a water and a A broken fishing pole here.
The beaver is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to hug the beaver so he'll cut  a tree for me.
data.mid_motivation: I want a new fallen tree in the moat so the log across the water will attract children.
data.long_motivation: I've always wanted to try children fingers, which look so delicious, and I plan to lie in wait beside the new log until they come too closely, and then: SNAP!
